entities.name: black
entities.description: The noble and most ancient house of Black is mentioned as a proper noun in the text.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is an owl that is being pacified by Ron with Owl Treats.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is another owl that is clattering around and rustling its wings restlessly.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is explaining to Harry why they can't let the owls out to hunt every night.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who doesn't want too many owls swooping around the square.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf that Ron mentions as a reason to bolt the door.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being spoken to by Ron.

relationships.description: Ron is pacifying Hedwig with Owl Treats.
Ron is also pacifying Pigwidgeon with Owl Treats.
Dumbledore does not want too many owls swooping around the square.
Ron is afraid of Kreacher and wants to bolt the door.
Harry is being spoken to by Ron.
